coreAttributes.name: underbust corset
coreAttributes.description: A corset that keeps the wearer's stomach nicely shaped, while leaving their breasts totally exposed. It has a series of laces at the back that are used to tighten it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the corset around [npc.her] stomach before tying the laces up at [npc.her] back.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the corset around [npc2.namePos] stomach before tying the laces up at [npc2.her] back.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(place)] the corset around [npc2.namePos] stomach before impatiently tying the laces up at [npc2.her] back.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] [npc.her] corset's laces and [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc.her] stomach.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] corset and [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc2.her] stomach.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(untie)] the laces of [npc2.namePos] corset and roughly [npc.verb(remove)] it from [npc2.her] stomach.
